Mini languages: 

-Markdown
-YAML
-Mosaic
-LaTeX


So we need to know some of these things to pick apart web pages to get data from. 

```{r}
head(BabyNames)
Name_count <- BabyNames %>%
  group_by(name, sex) %>%
  summarise(total=sum(count)) %>%
  filter(grepl('?',name))
Name_count
```
